fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Lisa has a very useful defense shred passive when her burst is active from her ascension 4 passive, and being a catalyst user she can hold thrilling tales. However her energy requirements are very high, it is recommended to have around 210-220 er on her and give zhongli the favonius lance

Yelan's ascension 4 passive is very useful for Eula, and since Eula has a string interruption resistance during her burst, she can stay on Bennett's field of effect to maximize her damage
